name: Shadeform
headline: The GPU Cloud Marketplace
description: Teams struggling with GPU availability use our platform to unlock capacity immediately for their growing AI workloads. Shadeform has a unified, easy-to-use API and platform to access and provision GPUs and deploy models for inference to any provider. With our aggregated availability and pricing data, we can help ensure your on-demand inference and training jobs will run on time at optimal cost.

founders.name: Ed Goode, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Shadeform. SWE with experience building distributed systems, compute orchestrators, and NLU & NLP services. Building a single control plane for the GPU market.

founders.name: Ronald Ding, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Shadeform. Former engineer and TL at Robinhood, AWS, and Microsoft working on large scale, distributed infrastructure.

generated_description:
**Shadeform: Revolutionizing GPU Accessibility** 

Founded in 2023 and a proud member of Y Combinator’s S23 batch, Shadeform aims to be your go-to solution for GPU resources through its unique **GPU Cloud Marketplace**. 

Imagine a world where teams are wrestling with GPU availability, especially while managing escalating AI workloads. That's where Shadeform steps in—offering a unified, user-friendly API that enables users to access and provision GPU resources from multiple providers seamlessly. This platform ensures that your on-demand inference and training tasks run on time and at the best possible cost.

**What’s exciting?** Shadeform provides real-time availability and pricing data, making it easier than ever to choose and launch the right instance across various cloud providers—all through a single console. Currently, they support seamless launch and management of GPU instances, covering everything from H200s to A6000s with a 0% service fee.

Located in a place you won't find listed (it's a startup thing), Shadeform operates with a compact yet nimble team of five. They are led by Group Partner, Diana Hu, who brings a wealth of expertise to the advisory table. 

**Key Features:**
- One-click launches for vms and containers across multiple cloud platforms.
- Live pricing and availability checks that give insights into the GPU market.
- A straightforward API offering for managing instances, whether you're using Shadeform's cloud or your own.

**Customer Testimonials:**
Users have raved about the service's ease and funds savings for substantial training runs. For anyone in need of GPU resources, Shadeform offers a clear path to savings—staying true to their commitment: “Using Shadeform is free. Pay the same as going directly to the provider.”

**Pricing?** No hidden fees. Yep, you read that right. 

For those looking to scale their AI efforts without the headache of navigating multiple cloud environments, Shadeform might just be the missing piece. Visit them at [shadeform.ai](https://www.shadeform.ai/) to get started.

In a landscape where computing power is everything, Shadeform is positioning itself as a vital ally for teams eager to harness the limitless potential of GPUs. Whether you're a small team or a bustling tech giant, their promise is worth exploring—after all, when it comes to AI, your next big leap could just be a launch away.
